properties.media:imagetext:
A matter of taste:
KIM'S wine cellar in the sky
With wine, the truth is not on the label but
behind it - in the bottle. Only by sampling a
wine can the quality be judged. This is why
KLM has its own wine tasting panel: a
dedicated group of experts who, throughout
the year, select the best possible wines for our
passengers. At the panel sessions, tasting is
always blind. In this way, the participants are
not influenced by names or reputations but
only by looking at the wine itself and
determining its intrinsic qualities - in
comparison with wines from the same
country, region or grape. The samples often
come straight from the producers themselves,
so that KLM's wine cellar in the sky regularly
carries exclusive wines no other airline could
offer.
Looking at our list, you will find wines from
famous, classical regions standing alongside
the so-called 'Adventure' wines: usually from
a non-traditional origin. By means of this
group, you can explore the taste sensations
offered these days by those less well-known
regions and New World countries.
Wine means variety and, by offering the
choice between conventional and
adventurous wines, KLM honours this
indisputable truth.
And please, ask the cabin staff to let you try
various wines and judge for yourself. This is
also an excellent way to discover your favourite
wine and food combinations, which are - of
course - very much a matter of taste.
Veer amer
Hubrecht Duyker
Wine writer
